Text.Page:
Do you want to join the dig for gold? Goldwings go absolutely mad for Gold Leaves, don’t ask me why. Presumably they look good in their lairs.

Bring me Gold Leaves between 10th and 15th September and I’ll help you to tame Goldwings. Use all 5 riding skills to receive the title Gold Digger.

In comparison to Fyraga over there, I eschew violence against these creatures. The dragons talk to us; we need but to open our hearts.
